comment.author: 56790419@N07
comment._content: I'm have my own collection of family civil war photos and so I skimmed these for resemblances. When I hit this I said "is it possible?" 1.bp.blogspot.com/_I3IWwUe_TZM/R2TSQiCg6dI/AAAAAAAAAh4/T2... 4.bp.blogspot.com/_I3IWwUe_TZM/R2TUfSCg6jI/AAAAAAAAAio/qj... Perhaps it's just my overactive imagination. There's also a resemblance to this one: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5229223780/in/s... Some pictures of what I think may be my Civil War ancestor, W.E. Bagley, can be found on a blog entry here: armstrong-collection.blogspot.com/2007/12/civil-war-bagle...
